methods.name: runningApplications
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch all running applications
- Returns: An array of all currently running applications

returns.description: An array of all currently running applications

methods.name: matchingName
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the first running application that matches a name
- Parameter name: The applicaiton name to search for
- Returns: The first matching application, or nil if none matched
methods.description: Fetch the first running application that matches a name

returns.description: The first matching application, or nil if none matched

methods.name: matchingBundleID
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the first running application that matches a Bundle ID
- Parameter bundleID: The identifier to search for
- Returns: The first matching application, or nil if none matched
methods.description: Fetch the first running application that matches a Bundle ID

returns.description: The first matching application, or nil if none matched

methods.name: fromPID
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the running application that matches a POSIX PID
- Parameter pid: The PID to search for
- Returns: The matching application, or nil if none matched
methods.description: Fetch the running application that matches a POSIX PID

returns.description: The matching application, or nil if none matched

methods.name: frontmost
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the currently focused application
- Returns: The matching application, or nil if none matched

returns.description: The matching application, or nil if none matched

methods.name: menuBarOwner
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the application which currently owns the menu bar
- Returns: The matching application, or nil if none matched
methods.description: Fetch the application which currently owns the menu bar

returns.description: The matching application, or nil if none matched

methods.name: pathForBundleID
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch the filesystem path for an application
- Parameter bundleID: The application bundle identifier to search for (e.g. "com.apple.Safari")
- Returns: The application's filesystem path, or nil if it was not found
methods.description: Fetch the filesystem path for an application

returns.description: The application's filesystem path, or nil if it was not found

methods.name: pathsForBundleID
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch filesystem paths for an application
- Parameter bundleID: The application bundle identifier to search for (e.g. "com.apple.Safari")
- Returns: An array of strings containing any filesystem paths that were found
methods.description: Fetch filesystem paths for an application

returns.description: An array of strings containing any filesystem paths that were found

methods.name: pathForFileType
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch filesystem path for an application able to open a given file type
- Parameter fileType: The file type to search for. This can be a UTType identifier, a MIME type, or a filename extension
- Returns: The path to an application for the given filetype, or il if none were found
methods.description: Fetch filesystem path for an application able to open a given file type

returns.description: The path to an application for the given filetype, or il if none were found

methods.name: pathsForFileType
methods.rawDocumentation:
Fetch filesystem paths for applications able to open a given file type
- Parameter fileType: The file type to search for. This can be a UTType identifier, a MIME type, or a filename extension
- Returns: An array of strings containing the filesystem paths for any applications that were found
methods.description: Fetch filesystem paths for applications able to open a given file type

returns.description: An array of strings containing the filesystem paths for any applications that were found

methods.name: launchOrFocus
methods.rawDocumentation:
Launch an application, or give it focus if it's already running
- Parameter bundleID: A bundle identifier for the app to launch/focus (e.g. "com.apple.Safari")
methods.description: Launch an application, or give it focus if it's already running

methods.name: axElement
methods.rawDocumentation: The application's HSAXElement object, for use with the hs.ax APIs
methods.description: The application's HSAXElement object, for use with the hs.ax APIs

properties.name: bundlePath
properties.rawDocumentation: Location of the application on disk
properties.description: Location of the application on disk

properties.name: mainWindow
properties.rawDocumentation: The main window of this application, or nil if there is no main window
properties.description: The main window of this application, or nil if there is no main window

properties.name: focusedWindow
properties.rawDocumentation: The focused window of this application, or nil if there is no focused window
properties.description: The focused window of this application, or nil if there is no focused window

properties.name: visibleWindows
properties.rawDocumentation: All visible (ie non-hidden) windows of this application
properties.description: All visible (ie non-hidden) windows of this application
